Description: Squat shouldered vase of pale pink marl pottery, with a flat base. The sides expand from the base to a high shoulder and then converge to a raised narrow neck, with external roll rim. The neck has not been centred on the body. Coated with a beige slip.
Curator's comments: Bibliography for excavations: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911). Marked H88a on base in faded ink, but vessel is not mentioned in text for this grave.
